trans-unit.source: InstallEventArgs contains an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that holds information about the current state of the installation.
trans-unit.target: InstallEventArgs 包含<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>保存安装的当前状态有关的信息。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall> event handlers use this information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall>，和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall>事件处理程序使用此信息。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs"></xref> class, and leaves the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState*> property empty.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs"></xref>类，并使<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState*>属性为空。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs"></xref> class, and specifies the value for the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs"></xref>类，并指定的值<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState*>属性。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that represents the current state of the installation.
Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that represents the current state of the installation.
An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that represents the current state of the installation.
